Name: Puzzling Rooms VR
About the game: 12 Rooms filled with 48 Puzzles and Mysteries to solve Classic Logic Puzzles(Sokoban/Sudoku/Lights Out/Jigsaw/Sliding Tiles/Tangrams), Hidden Objects, Tower Defense, Physical Challenges Can you solve all the mysteries? True room scale game, walk to move, requires 2.75m x 2.75m(9ft x 9ft), works best with 3m x 3m+ Several of my mobile games are included as Table Top in VR - Tower Defense - Tanks and Turrets 3 and Sokoban - Puzzling Cubes.
